metadata.name: Github Push Protection Bypass Detected
metadata.comment: Detects when a user bypasses the push protection on a secret detected by secret scanning.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM vulnerability_finding WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(action), lower('secret_scanning_push_protection.bypass')))

output.summary: Detects when a user bypasses the push protection on a secret detected by secret scanning.

metadata.objective: False positive: Allowed administrative activities. References: https://docs.github.com/en/enterprise-cloud@latest/code-security/secret-scanning/push-protection-for-repositories-and-organizations, https://thehackernews.com/2024/03/github-rolls-out-default-secret.html
